title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 86-5.5 - Accountant's certification
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 86-5.5 - Accountant's certification

State Regulations

The financial and statistical reports shall be certified by an independent licensed public accountant or an independent certified public accountant. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
86-5.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
